sect1.title: Machine-independent I2C drivers
sect1.para: The I2C bus is a standard serial bus used as an interconnect between components on a device. This is a support bus, and does not export an interface to the user. However, having this generic I2C support can aid device driver writers, as they will not have to re-implement I2C support code if their device uses I2C.
